channel.title: Welcome to the Onshape Developer Documentation on
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to the Onshape Developer Documentation on

item.title: Changelog
item.description: rel-1.186 - released 2024-08-29 Added new V9 version to the api (https://cad.onshape.com/api/versions), returning deterministicIds in query responses for GET : ‘/features’. New list tasks endpoint GET : /tasks New create task endpoint POST : /tasks New list tasks endpoint GET : /tasks/[:tid] New update task endpoint POST : /tasks/[:tid] New transition task endpoint POST : /tasks/[:tid]/[:transition] Updated modify drawings endpoint POST : /drawings/d/[:did]/w/[:wid]/e/[:eid]/modify to support editing annotations (messageName = onshapeEditAnnotations) rel-1.
